did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: James J. Bambrick "The Building Service Story" Manuscript, 1948- 1948
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: "'Your Union Can't Live with Racketeers or Communists' as told in The Building Service Story," by James J. Bambrick.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: James J. Bambrick was founder and builder of Local 32-B.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a photocopy of "'Your Union Can't Live with Racketeers or Communists' as told in The Building Service Story," by James J. Bambrick.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: James J. Bambrick "The Building Service Story" Manuscript #6072m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
